entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
